data.message: Alright listen, to all you haters dissin' slim heres a word in defese of him, my friend eminem:  First off, an illuminati hes not, hes worked for everything that hes got, talk that shit and get shot like they did to tupac, yall just jealous hes white hot and youre not, all burnt out in the dark u dwarf star, call you illumin-NOT, your whack, get smacked with a commented rap and go talk your crap on someone elses's wall fucking fag, keep running your mouths, be glad i cant knock yall out and kick yall in the balls cause theres a firewall between us all...fuck with the man and try to harm his reputation,youre fucking with fans that swarm with intent to do bodily harm across nations so test our patience and youll find yourself in the emergency room waiting to be a patient suffering from a tramaticly hazardous ailment brought on by anally inflicted lacerations and creating dangerous situations with your statements.  Fuck you

replies.message: Hey David get Stan's Eminem hoodie 30$ only interested ?? check out my timeline
